summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHOURGLASS Vanish Airbrush Concealer is an award-winning, 100% vegan, full-coverage concealer that blurs and brightens for a skin-perfecting finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsWeightless, creamy formula instantly blends into skin and sets to a natural, airbrushed finishLiquid formula conceals dark circles, discoloration, blemishes, age spots and hyperpigmentationContains microspherical powders that fill in lines and provide a smooth, even applicationCustom designed applicator has unique flexibility, allowing it to hug contours for added precisionApplicator is perfectly flocked to prevent tugging on delicate skinLong-wearing for 16 hoursCrease-resistant for 16 hoursWaterproofNon-comedogenicRange includes shades that can be used for color correctingCruelty freeFormulated WithoutAlcoholBHA/BHTGlutenGMOMercuryMineral OilNanoparticlesParabensPhthalatesPolyfluorinated / Perfluorinated compoundsTalcTriclosanSulfatesSynthetic DyesSynthetic FragranceWaxResearch ResultsBased on a US consumer study of 32 women:97% found the formula lightweight on the skin94% said the under-eye area looked brighter94% reported a blurring or smoothing effect under the eyesItem 2575916How To UseUse applicator to apply directly onto skin. Blend with Vanish Seamless Finish Concealer Brush, finger or beauty sponge.Concentrated formula requires just 1-3 dots under each eye.To conceal, select a shade that matches the natural skin tone. To highlight, select two shades lighter than the natural skin tone and apply to the high points of the face.PRO TIP: This concealer range includes shades that can be used for color correcting. Use the following shades to neutralize darkness and brighten the skin:Cr√®me - Neutralizes blue darkness in fair skin tonesSilk - Brightens and neutralizes undereye darkness for light skin tonesPearl - Brightens and neutralizes undereye darkness for light to medium skintonesSienna - Neutralizes blue/grey under eye darkness for medium skin tonesTopaz - Brightens and neutralizes grey/brown darkness for medium to dark skin tonesIngredientsOat: Water/Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Mica, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Pvp, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Barium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Methicone, Myristic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Polysilicone-11, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Squalane, Stearic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499).*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use applicator to apply directly onto skin. Blend with Vanish Seamless Finish Concealer Brush, finger or beauty sponge.Concentrated formula requires just 1-3 dots under each eye.To conceal, select a shade that matches the natural skin tone. To highlight, select two shades lighter than the natural skin tone and apply to the high points of the face.PRO TIP: This concealer range includes shades that can be used for color correcting. Use the following shades to neutralize darkness and brighten the skin:Cr√®me - Neutralizes blue darkness in fair skin tonesSilk - Brightens and neutralizes undereye darkness for light skin tonesPearl - Brightens and neutralizes undereye darkness for light to medium skintonesSienna - Neutralizes blue/grey under eye darkness for medium skin tonesTopaz - Brightens and neutralizes grey/brown darkness for medium to dark skin tones

reviews.headline: love ALL Hourglass
reviews.comments: This has become my new favorite brand to go to. Concealer COVERS.. highly recommend

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: LOVE THIS PRODUCT, SO NICE ON MY FACE AND COMPLEXION

reviews.headline: Exchange
reviews.comments:
Love their concealer for mature skin, however, I believe I got a bad one this go around.  Just going to exchange it for another one. I put it on and it dries IMMEDIARELY on my skin to the ppint I cant blend it. Weird 
Dont let that stop you, their line is AMAZING!

reviews.headline: So good
reviews.comments: I'd rather use this over my foundation now! It's perfect üò≠

reviews.headline: Great color match but broke me out :(
reviews.comments: I got the color Drift and it was a perfect match to my skin and looked so natural. It has great coverage, looks airbrushed, and I thought I had found the perfect concealer for my blemishes. Sadly, it broke me out every time I used it and aggrivated my acne! Something in this is not good for sensitive skin. It's also really expensive for a concealer. I love Hourglass products but this was a miss for me. I think their blushes and bronzers are their bread and butter, ao I'll stick with those.

reviews.headline: Best concealer!
reviews.comments: I used to wear the tarte shape tape concealer but I like this concealer better bc its easier to blend out, and it doesnt feel dry! ü´∂üèª

reviews.headline: wanted to love but couldn't
reviews.comments: was looking for something new and I went ahead and picked this up as it's had so many great reviews. the coverage is amazing and long lasting, but it broke me out so bad!! I wouldn't wear makeup the whole week and upon applying this I would get the worst breakout the day after. Returning as it's good, but not worth damaging my skin.

reviews.headline: ts sucks
reviews.comments: if you have dry skin dont get it. cakey

reviews.headline: A bit disappointing
reviews.comments: It's a beautiful formula! I can see why it is so loved but I think I'm one of those rare few that it creases on & doesn't sit well on my skin. I do all the proper prep and it starts getting patchy immediately after blending. I really wanted to love this!

reviews.headline: Not My Favorite
reviews.comments: Wanted to love this product. I have heard great things about it, but it wasnt for me. Prepped skin properly. But it was too drying for me and creased after setting it. üò≠

reviews.headline: Very Drying
reviews.comments: Returned this. Was extremely drying, even over a moisturizing primer. The color match was amazing though and it did not oxidize.

reviews.headline: Life changing
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this concealer.  You don't need a lot to achieve an airbrush look while offering coverage and lighting.  I don't wear foundation so I can wear this with a little tint and feel great all day. It does not crease or get cakey.

reviews.headline: It's the best concealer I've used
reviews.comments: It's the best concealer I love it

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: Probably my favorite concealer at the moment, ive seen mixed reviews but you never know until you try it yourself. Full coverage, thick but lightweight, super creamy. Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: MUST HAVE
reviews.comments: The older I get, the more I realize sometimes less is more. My entire face looks flawless with zero foundation when I use this concealer! I'm an oily girl and I LOVE this product.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't get again
reviews.comments: Once its put on it looks great, but once it sets it turns yellow on me and it looks very dry.

reviews.headline: My go to concealer
reviews.comments: I will always have a backup one. Its amazing doesn't crease when I use it with Huda beauty powder.

reviews.headline: Really good
reviews.comments: This reminds me of the urban decay concealer they had yrs ago that was my fav that they discontinued, I really love this its gonna be my new favorite!! I will say defly moisturize your face first it can give a little of a powdery look if you don't. Very full coverage and staysss.. and u only need a little, super cute. Im light med skin i got the shade oat, I usually lean more cool but I liked the way oat looked better. Worth it.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: When I tried it on in the store, it looked fantastic, but when I put it on at home, it made my undergoes look way wrinkly. It's just gotta be returned.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I love this concealer. It is honestly the best that I have tried- and I've tried many! It leaves no creases on your eyes.

media.headline: This a great concealer for me.

faceoff_positive.comments: As someone who suffers from hereditary dark circles, I am always on the hunt for a good concealer. As I've gotten older, it has become more and more difficult to find out that doesn't look crepey under my eyes after I've set it and last all day. This one goes on smooth and covers well with only one coat. What I really like though is that because it is so light weight, almost like a serum, I can use a second coat for even more coverage without having to worry about it looking heavy. It last all day as well. I put on my makeup around 8am and when I get home from work at 6, it still looks the same without any touch ups. I did find that it oxidizes some, so you may want to go 1 shade lighter as it will darken just a little but not to a bad color. Highly recommend
faceoff_positive.headline: It really does make dark circles vanish!

faceoff_negative.comments: Heard all the great reviews & I wanted to love it. Looks great lasts all day and is super easy to work with. Now unfortunately after 2 days I started getting a bad skin reaction and upon reading ingredients it has Myristic Acid, which tends to be a no go for those of us with acne prone skin. It is an ingredient rated a 5/5 on the comedogenic scale. This was the only change in my routine and after discontinuing use of this concealer my skin went back to normal in 2 days. This is unfortunately the reaction I have with products that contain Myristate or Myristic Acid is found in this product. Pictures to show
faceoff_negative.headline: SENSITIVE SKIN STAY AWAY
